tool.name: List Installed SnpEff Genomes
tool.description: Checks the local SnpEff installation to compile a list of currently installed genomes
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
When executed this tool searches the host machine's SnpEff installation for properly registered and installed genome annotation files. The resulting list is added as a plain text file to your history for use with the *Variant Annotation* Tool.
